title: Got an S rank but no box or keys?
body: So I got an S rank in a game with Sona but I haven't received a chest or a key. I don't think others on my team got anything as well? Is this a bug or will we still get a chest later?

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and based on what I see, it looks like you already earned a Hextech Chest with Sona a few days ago (though it was delivered a little late due to delays with the system at that time). Hextech key fragments work a little differently: There's a chance for them to drop after every win, regardless of your score. 

For more information on Hextech Crafting, check out [the guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) on our support site :D

Let me know if this helps!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Nh9Pk2tE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-23T23:19:11.319+0000)
>
> I took a look at your account and based on what I see, it looks like you already earned a Hextech Chest with Sona a few days ago (though it was delivered a little late due to delays with the system at that time). Hextech key fragments work a little differently: There's a chance for them to drop after every win, regardless of your score. 
> 
> For more information on Hextech Crafting, check out [the guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) on our support site :D
> 
> Let me know if this helps!

What's the drop rate for keys? I've played about 20 games since I got my last one 3 days ago and won 17 out of 20 of those games and still no key.

There's some variance to how often you'll get keys as the key drop rates are not linear. As I didn't work on these systems, I'd recommend checking out the [recent comments](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/rJ4rQmHA-after-getting-4-chests-key-fragments-no-longer-seem-to-drop-for-a-lot-of-people?comment=0006) by Wingfield (NA ecommerce manager). Should hopefully help explain it a bit better than I could :)

can you take a look at my account also? i have the same situation, recently i have scored a S rank mutiple time with Sona and Nami. But i didnt get any keys. I though we suppose get a chest or a key after you receive a S ran k. Although u have receive all your chests but you still will receive the key after you score a S rank.

Key fragments aren't guaranteed after an S ranking.  You have a chance to get a key fragment after every win regardless of your score or your teammates scores.

As mentioned before, the drop rate isn't linear.  As Wingfield commented in the linked thread, you can think of it like a leveling system. Earlier key fragments take less "XP" to earn than later keys.  Hope this helps explain things :D
So it is true that drop rates on keys lessens as you aquire more? If so why should keys be at a constant downward rate and also will they eventually just be pretty close to extinct?

The earn rate resets on an individual cadence lasting about a month. I'd really recommend checking out [Wingfield's comments](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/rJ4rQmHA-after-getting-4-chests-key-fragments-no-longer-seem-to-drop-for-a-lot-of-people?comment=0006)! Most of this information is explained in better detail :D

So is it kinda like this (random numbers obviously):

Day 01 - Win 01 - 1st key frag     36% (fake drop rate)
Day 02 - Win 03 - 2nd                  17.5%
Day 04 - Win 12 - 3rd                   5% 
Day 13 - Win 26 - 4th                  .25%

So each drop would decrease the subsequent drop chance until it becomes extremely hard to win a fragment.

Now the reset would affect you per key frag that is greater than 30 days, right?

So, using my previous example;

Then Day 31, 32, 34, and 56 should each "increase" the key drop rate in reverse order.
Meaning Day 31 would be back to .25% and so on?

Or am I completely imagining this wrong?

They way I've seen it said:
Day 31 Win 01 would be back to 36%
Day 32 Win 03 would be back to 17.5%
ect...

It's a reset, not a snake system. At least that's how I've seen Rioters kinda explain it. (without the actual numbers)

That would be the only other model it could be.

I just started thinking about the whole (too much probably).

Either system would explain why most people are not getting key fragments currently. I guess we'll find out which "system" Riot is using in the coming weeks as more data comes in :3

Ghostcrawler said there is a bug right now that drastically lowers some peoples ability to get keys. This is the only places it's been mentioned to my knowledge. So who knows how many people this effects and to what rate. 

Question
>I've been stuck on 1 key fragment for the past week or so, playing 2 or three games a day. Partially this is because I play a lot of ARAM, but even so, I feel like there's no way for me to open my free chests but to buy keys. I really regret my purchase of 7 key+chest bundles if this is how it works

Answer
>I asked around a little bit based on some player responses, and there is a known situation where a small percentage of players can get stuck in a really long wait for keys to drop. That's not ideal and definitely the kind of thing we should be able to adjust. I do apologize for any frustration you might be feeling.
We will get keys into ARAM too. That was always the intent.

Hmm I missed that post, but it could explain some of the issues people are having.

As for ARAM/TT, I can't wait for a fix to come through :\

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Nh9Pk2tE,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-05T01:23:26.072+0000)
>
> The earn rate resets on an individual cadence lasting about a month. I'd really recommend checking out [Wingfield's comments](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/rJ4rQmHA-after-getting-4-chests-key-fragments-no-longer-seem-to-drop-for-a-lot-of-people?comment=0006)! Most of this information is explained in better detail :D

In that thread a "limit" on key fragments was mentioned but never expanded on. Can we only get 12 key fragments in one month? How many wins would be expected to acquire that number? If you don't get all your key fragments in a month, does that mean that those potential drops are effectively lost and, assuming you get every chest drop, you will have a chest that you won't ever be able to open without buying a key?

So i have the same problem i think. Can you take a look at my profil too? Because i played a ranked game with miss fortune that i own her, my ally took S with Jhin and i didnt get a Hextech Box! And generally i only get Hextech key fragments...I have 5 keys!

I also didn't get a box after getting S+ with sejuani in ranked. It is like my first time getting an S with that champ. It also said I got a box from my champion I owned for Sejuani, but I never did for him. I only got three soo far.
I got an S- With Alistar, Mundo, S+ with mao, but no boxes. how come?

So i have the same problem i think. Can you take a look at my profil too? Because i played a ranked game with miss fortune that i own her, my ally took S with Jhin and i didnt get a Hextech Box! And generally i only get Hextech key fragments...I have 5 keys!
Were you in a premade group with the Jhin? If a teammate gets an S- grade or better, you will only receive a hextech chest if you were in a premade group with them.

WHEN WILL I GET I 
I WAS GRINDING SO HARD AND NOW I DONT GET IT CMN
its been one month since the last time i got a chest i have win after win and some S but still no chest

Are you playing champions that you have already earned a chest on? You can only earn one chest per champion per season, so if you keep getting S grades with the same few champions over and over, then you will only get a few chests.
S ranks but no boxes i think im working on number 6 or 7 trys

same thing happened to me as well i got S rank with both Teemo and Jhin and i was orking so so hard so i can get a skin of them (dream skin is to ge t Omega Squad Teemo and High Noon Jhin) but i got nothing....again and again and again
